item.title: Meta 推出 Llama 应用程序接口，吸引人工智能开发人员
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司周二发布了一个应用程序接口，旨在吸引企业利用其 Llama 人工智能模型更轻松地构建人工智能产品。【原文：Meta Platforms on Tuesday announced an application programming interface in a bid to woo businesses to more easily build AI products using its Llama artificial-intelligence models.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，电子艺界裁员数百人，取消《泰坦陨落》游戏
item.description: 据彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周二报道，电子艺界（Electronic Arts）将裁员数百人，并将取消旗下 Respawn Entertainment 部门正在开发的《泰坦陨落》（Titanfall）游戏。【原文：Electronic Arts is laying off hundreds of workers and is canceling a Titanfall game that was in development at its Respawn Entertainment unit, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 墨西哥电信巨头 America Movil 第一季度利润大增 39
item.description: 墨西哥电信巨头 America Movil 周二公布，其第一季度净利润与 2024 年同期相比大增 39%，原因是营业利润增加和融资成本下降。【原文：Mexican telecommunications giant America Movil on Tuesday reported a 39% jump in its first-quarter net profit compared to the same period in 2024, citing an increase in operating profit and a decrease in financing costs.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称捷蓝航空正与美国联合航空公司商谈合作事宜
item.description: 三位熟悉此事的业内人士告诉路透社记者，捷蓝航空公司和美国联合航空公司一直在就合作事宜进行谈判。【原文：JetBlue Airways and United Airlines have been negotiating a partnership, three industry sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Blackstone 探讨以 30 亿美元出售可持续性软件公司 Sphera
item.description: 据三位熟悉此事的人士透露，Blackstone 正在探讨以 30 亿美元出售可持续性软件和咨询服务提供商 Sphera。【原文：Blackstone is exploring a $3 billion sale of Sphera, a sustainability software and consulting services provider, according to three people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 巴西银行即将完成收购 Banco Master 的尽职调查
item.description: 巴西国营银行巴西商业银行首席执行官保罗-恩里克-科斯塔（Paulo Henrique Costa）周二表示，巴西商业银行已接近完成收购当地贷款机构 Banco Master 的尽职调查，预计最终交易价格将确定在 20 亿雷亚尔（约合 3.6 亿美元）左右。【原文：Brazilian state-run bank BRB has nearly completed its due diligence to acquire local lender Banco Master, with the final deal price expected to be confirmed at around 2 billion reais ($360 million), BRB CEO Paulo Henrique Costa said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 墨西哥沃尔玛第一季度净利润下降近 7
item.description: 墨西哥零售商沃尔玛（Wal-Mart de Mexico）周二发布报告称，其第一季度利润同比下降 6.6%，降至 123.17 亿比索（约合 6.02 亿美元），低于分析师预期。【原文：La minorista mexicana Wal-Mart de México informó el martes que sus ganancias descendieron un 6.6% interanual en el primer trimestre, a 12,317 millones de pesos (602 millones de dólares), por debajo de las expectativas de los analistas.】

item.title: 交易日：您想做交易吗？
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 巴西 Gerdau 公司对来自美国的钢铁订单保持乐观态度
item.description: 巴西钢铁制造商 Gerdau 的高管们周二表示，尽管美国贸易政策引发了担忧，但由于订单积压较多，该公司对其北美业务的表现仍持乐观态度。【原文：Brazilian steelmaker Gerdau remains optimistic about the performance of its North American operations, given a high order backlog, despite concerns generated by the U.S. trade policy, executives said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 墨西哥电视广播公司第一季度利润下滑 66
item.description: 墨西哥最大的广播公司 Grupo Televisa 周二公布的一份文件显示，该公司第一季度净利润下降了 66%，降至 3.198 亿比索（约合 1563 万美元）。【原文：Mexico's largest broadcaster Grupo Televisa posted a 66% drop in net profit in the first quarter, sinking to to 319.8 million pesos ($15.63 million), according to a filing published by the company on Tuesday.】

item.title: 凯撒娱乐第一季度亏损因体育博彩业务激增而收窄
item.description: 赌场运营商凯撒娱乐公司（Caesars Entertainment）周二公布的亏损额有所收窄，主要原因是体育博彩需求旺盛，数字业务部门表现强劲。【原文：Casino operator Caesars Entertainment posted a narrower loss on Tuesday, driven by strong performance in its digital unit amid high demand for sports betting.】

item.title: 服务器制造商超微下调第三季度业绩预期
item.description: 人工智能服务器制造商超微计算机公司（Super Micro Computer）周二表示，下调了对第三季度收入和利润的预期，原因是客户支出延迟，股价在盘后交易中下跌超过 16%。【原文：AI server maker Super Micro Computer said on Tuesday it cut expectations for third-quarter revenue and profit, blaming a delay in customer spending, sending shares down more than 16% in extended trading.】

item.title: 希捷预测第四季度大容量存储需求稳定，业绩强劲
item.description: 希捷科技（Seagate Technology）周二预测第四季度业绩高于华尔街预期，表明市场对其用于个人电脑大容量存储的存储和云设备的需求稳定，公司股价盘后上涨 6%。【原文：Seagate Technology on Tuesday forecast fourth-quarter results above Wall Street estimates, signaling steady demand for its storage and cloud devices for mass capacity storage used in personal computers, sending the company's shares up 6% after the bell.】

item.title: 国际旅游助力 Booking Holdings 季度业绩增长
item.description: 在线旅行社Booking Holdings周二公布的第一季度利润和收入超出分析师预期，原因是国际旅游需求的持续增长帮助该公司抵消了美国经济衰退带来的疲软。【原文：Online travel agency Booking Holdings beat analysts' expectations for first-quarter profit and revenue on Tuesday, as sustained demand for international travel helped the company offset weakness in the U.S. amid fears of a recession.】

item.title: 人工智能软件需求稳定，Freshworks 上调年度收入和利润预期
item.description: 受人工智能驱动的软件服务需求增长的推动，Freshworks 周二发布了乐观的季度财报，并上调了全年营收和利润预期，高于华尔街预期。【原文：Freshworks raised its annual revenue and profit forecast above Wall Street expectations following upbeat quarterly results on Tuesday, fueled by growing demand for its AI-driven software services.】

item.title: 联合健康任命内部人士 Patrick Conway 担任 Optum 首席执行官
item.description: 联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group）周二表示，集团内部人士帕特里克-康威（Patrick Conway）将接替希瑟-西安弗罗科（Heather Cianfrocco），出任集团医疗服务部门 Optum 的最高职位。【原文：UnitedHealth Group on Tuesday said insider Patrick Conway will take on the top job at Optum, its health services segment, replacing Heather Cianfrocco, who will take on a new role within the healthcare conglomerate effective May 6.】

item.title: 经济不确定性危及广告预算，Snap 下架季度预测
item.description: Snap周二表示，由于美国关税有可能扰乱全球经济和数字广告预算，公司将以经济不确定性为由不发布正式的第二季度财务预测，股价在盘中一度下跌9%。【原文：Snap said on Tuesday it will not issue a formal second-quarter financial forecast citing economic uncertainty, as U.S. tariffs threaten to disrupt the global economy and digital advertising budgets, sending its shares down 9% in extended trading.】

item.title: 由于巧克力和饼干需求强劲，Mondelez 第一季度利润超出预期
item.description: 周二，受高价巧克力和饼干需求回升的推动，吉百利母公司蒙迪艾尔国际公司（Mondelez International）第一季度利润超出华尔街预期。【原文：Cadbury-parent Mondelez International beat Wall Street estimates for first-quarter profit on Tuesday, driven by resilient demand for its high-priced chocolates and biscuits.】

item.title: 罗技公布第四季度季度利润疲软
item.description: 罗技国际公司周二公布的第四季度财报显示，公司第四季度盈利低于预期。【原文：Logitech International on Tuesday reported weaker-than-expected fourth-quarter earnings.】

item.title: Visa 盈利超预期，信用卡消费额强劲，计划回购 300 亿美元
item.description: 周二，Visa 的季度利润超过了华尔街的预期，这家全球最大的支付处理商受益于银行卡支付量的稳步增长，并宣布了一项价值 300 亿美元的股票回购计划。【原文：Visa beat Wall Street estimates for quarterly profit on Tuesday, as the world's largest payment processor benefited from a steady rise in card payment volumes and announced a $30 billion share repurchase plan.】

item.title: 瑞银从巴克莱银行聘请银行家凯尔文-奎萨达（Kelvin Quezada）加强并购业务
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份备忘录，凯尔文-奎萨达（Kelvin Quezada）在巴克莱银行工作近二十年后，将加入瑞银集团，担任统一全球银行业务（UGB）美洲团队的董事总经理。【原文：Kelvin Quezada is set to join UBS as managing director in the Unified Global Banking (UGB) Americas team after nearly two decades at Barclays, according to a memo seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 美国需求疲软，星巴克全球销售额降幅超预期
item.description: 周二，星巴克公布的季度全球可比销售额降幅大于预期，原因是在宏观经济不确定性上升的情况下，美国市场对星巴克高价咖啡的需求依然低迷。【原文：Starbucks posted a bigger-than-expected drop in quarterly global comparable sales on Tuesday, as demand remained sluggish for its pricey coffees in the United States amid rising macroeconomic uncertainty.】

item.title: 据 Business Insider 报道，特斯拉招聘 1,000 多名工人以提高 Semi 卡车产量
item.description: 据《商业内幕》周二援引知情人士的话报道，特斯拉正在内华达州招聘一千多名新员工，因为这家电动汽车制造商希望加快量产延期已久的 Semi 卡车。【原文：Tesla is hiring more than a thousand new workers in Nevada as the electric vehicle maker looks to ramp up mass production of its much-delayed Semi trucks, Business Insider reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 金砖国家部长未能达成联合声明，巴西警告反对保护主义
item.description: 金砖五国（BRICS）发展中国家集团外长周二在里约热内卢举行会议后未能达成联合公报，但主席国巴西发表声明反对贸易保护主义。【原文：Foreign ministers from the BRICS group of developing nations failed to reach a joint communique on Tuesday after meeting in Rio de Janeiro, but chair Brazil issued a statement speaking out against trade protectionism.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，特朗普官员希望修改拜登的人工智能芯片出口规则
item.description: 三位熟悉内情的消息人士称，特朗普政府正在着手修改拜登时代的一项限制全球获得人工智能芯片的规定，包括可能取消将全球分成若干等级的规定，该等级有助于确定一个国家可以获得多少先进半导体。【原文：The Trump administration is working on changes to a Biden-era rule that would limit global access to AI chips, including possibly doing away with its splitting the world into tiers that help determine how many advanced semiconductors a country can obtain, three sources familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 卢特尼克称美国已与一个国家达成贸易协议，但他还不能说出这个国家的名字
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）周二在接受CNBC采访时表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的政府已经达成了一项贸易协议，正在等待该国批准后再予以公布。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's administration has reached one trade deal already and is waiting for approvals from that country before announcing it, U.S. Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said in an interview with CNBC on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国企业债券市场近期反弹背后透露出谨慎情绪
item.description: 债券市场专家表示，尽管自唐纳德-特朗普总统首次宣布苛刻关税并随后提供临时减免以来的几周内，新债发行量和信用利差有所反弹，但美国企业债券市场仍显示出对经济和通胀持谨慎态度的迹象。【原文：U.S. corporate bond markets are showing signs of caution about the economy and inflation despite a rebound in new issuances and credit spreads in the weeks since President Donald Trump first announced harsh tariffs and then provided temporary relief on them, bond market experts said.】

item.title: 特朗普带来半永久性不确定性，股市创尼克松执政以来最差百日开局
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统上任后的头 100 天，将为股市带来自 1973 年前总统理查德-尼克松第二任期以来最糟糕的开局，这激起了整个市场的波动，并使人们产生了半永久性不确定状态的预期。【原文：President Donald Trump's first 100 days in office, set to deliver the worst start for stocks since former President Richard Nixon's second term in 1973, have stoked volatility across markets and created expectations of a semi-permanent state of uncertainty.】

item.title: 路透社调查显示第一季度墨西哥经济持平
item.description: 路透社周二的一项民意调查显示，由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税政策起伏不定，墨西哥经济在2025年前三个月可能保持平稳。【原文：Mexico's economy likely remained flat in the first three months of 2025 as a result of uncertainty generated by U.S. President Donald Trump's fluctuating tariff policies, a Reuters poll showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 据天空新闻报道，巴宝莉开始寻找主席格里-墨菲（Gerry Murphy）的继任者
item.description: 据天空新闻周二报道，英国奢侈品牌巴宝莉正在评估接替格里-墨菲（Gerry Murphy）担任董事长的潜在人选。【原文：British luxury brand Burberry is evaluating potential candidates to succeed Gerry Murphy as chairman, Sky News reported on Tuesday.】
